plot: An underachieving vocal coach is motivated by her father, the king of movie-trailer voice-overs, to pursue her aspirations of becoming a voiceover star. Amidst pride, sexism and family dysfunction, she sets out to change the voice of a generation.

m.role: Demetri Martin's character in In a World... plays this very straight.
Dogged Nice Guy: Demetri Martin's character is a very straight example.
In a World...: Gustav. Carol's father shares many of the same attitudes but is more nuanced and, unlike Gustav, learns An Aesop by the end of the film.
Straw Misogynist: Gustav. Carol's father shares many of the same attitudes but is more nuanced and, unlike Gustav, learns An Aesop by the end of the film.

f.role: Daddy's Girl: Played with. Carol and her father have a difficult relationship, but they are definitely close.
In a World: Played with. Lake Bell and her father have a difficult relationship, but they are definitely close.
In a World...: Lake Bell is a rare example of a MPDG as the main protagonist. Love interest Demetri Martin is a Rare Male Example of Manic Pixie Dream Guy.
Manic Pixie Dream Girl: Carol is a rare example of a MPDG as the main protagonist. Demetri Martin's love interest character is a Rare Male Example of Manic Pixie Dream Guy.
In a World...: Lake Bell's father is either a widower or divorced; we don't hear much about her mom.
Missing Mom: Carol's father is a widower; we don't hear much about her mom other than that she has (had?) various substance abuse problems and apparently OD'd.
A few minor characters in In a World.... Lake Bell recruits them for her vocal training service to teach them to sound like "women" and not "sexy babies".
Valley Girl: A few minor characters. Carol recruits them for her vocal training service to teach them to sound like "women" and not "sexy babies".

name: In a World
